manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: From the bright and stylish design to the accent pops of color, you will never have to worry about keeping track of these eye-catchers! American Tourister Belle Voyage Hardside Introducing a line built to take the harshest travel elements! The American Tourister Belle Voyage combines a modern print with the lightest construction, ensuring your luggage looks as great on the 100th trip as it does on the first. Extremely light and visually impactful, this collection takes travel design to the next level. 21” Spinner* 20 x 14 x 9, 7.5 lbs. 24” Spinner 24 x 16 x 11, 9.3 lbs. 28” Spinner 29.25 x 19.5 x 12.5, 11 lbs.

Functional and Thoughtful Design Push-Button Handle Wider pull handle combine to provide an exceptionally comfortable grip. Integrated, multi-stage aluminum pull handle for extra lightness. Retracting top and side carry-handles remain protected when checking baggage. Expansion on All Sizes Cases expand for added packing capacity. Large front panel interior pocket for added packing organization. Deep main compartment with mesh modesty pocket for personal items. Compression straps keep clothing neatly packed while traveling. 360 Spinner Wheels This lightweight line offers heavyweight protection riding on effortless 360 degree Spinner Wheels. All you need to do is push your case along and the wheels do the rest. Whether you are checking into to the flight or your hotel, it is super-easy with spinner wheels.

About American Tourister At American Tourister, we believe travel should be fun. We take pride in making stylish, high quality, and yeah, fun luggage that you can rely on. Now, over 75 years later, American Tourister is positioned as one of the largest luggage brands in the world. Thanks to its continued tradition of quality and design at a great value, American Tourister is the smart choice for you and your family, offering a wide selection of travel products including luggage items as well as casual, and business bags. We understand how you travel, so we're ready to go when you are with the gear that's right for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect luggage set!!
reviews.reviewText: Finally it has arrived! This one is my replacement! Amazon could not locate nor could I locate the original box although it said it was delivered a week ago. But Shivani with Amazon sent this one and it got here today! Amen! I bought the smallest size 20” interior from Walmart initially and figured why not get the largest one “28 interior to replace my old red one! See picture for reference! It’s sleek and beautiful as always! The patterns on the outside and the gold accents just make it pop! I feel like a fancy business lady in the airport!!! Thanks Amazon and thank you American Tourister! The only brand I’ve sworn by since I was a little girl! 💕Durable, strong, super light, roomy, and I love that it has separate compartments; one on the left with a large zipper and a mini zipper with a divider and then one on the right that’s fully open with the clip strap for clothes. There’s also a zipper flap on the right side as well for jewelry or other small items. It’s got an extension zipper on the exterior as well so if you need an extra inch or two of room for space you can expand it if needed! All in all, my fave brand and this set although each suitcase is purchased separately, I love through and through!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is beautiful. I bought the carryon and I am coming back for the larger. Rolling is smooth, zippers glide easy. Inside is attractive with a nice touch on the little pockets that separate the center. I feel like this was a great investment and amazing bargain! I had been looking for about a year to replace mine… the pull up handles were awful . This luggage has a nice solid , sturdy handle that is easy to extend. The outside has a nice finish and I like the gold. You won’t be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Durable and Pretty!
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter loves this luggage. It has just the right space and enough compartments to hold her clothes, sock, and undies. We all love the gold trim!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Did it's job
reviews.reviewText: Summer trip to the winter in Australia. Durable, lightweight & easy to glide.I can say, I don't think the zipper will last as long as it should.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the pockets and dividers
reviews.reviewText: The divider is not all mesh and has pockets. Much easier to organize than other suitcases.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of my favourites!
reviews.reviewText: Affordable, pretty! I loved this suitcase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Make sure to get a suitcase cover after traveling abroad it has a light of white marks. But overall the quality is great and I am satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't hesitate, just buy it!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this suitcase. I bought it 2 years ago. At that time I was travelling for work weekly - so this thing took a beating.I would fly 2-3 times per week and check this bag. There are a few scuffs on the outside, but the pattern hides them well. All handles are in good working order, and the wheels are all still in great condition.The suitcase is large. I appreciate that one side can be zipped closed, while the other has elastic straps that keep your items organized. I highly recommend using travel cubes to keep your items organized when you travel.10/10, would buy this suitcase again but thankfully it's so great I don't think I'll need to buy another any time soon! Well, except maybe to get a carry on size.

i have overloaded this and checked this on many planes and this thing has been lugged through the snow and through parking lots and no issues. it’s got scratches now but shows no sign of breaking on me.
Muy buenos materiales, el tamaño es excelente

First off, I have been extremely picky in finding the perfect carry on that has a balance of both style/sophistication and quality. THIS IS IT!It’s exactly as described and absolutely beautiful. I know a lot of other reviews mentioned it arrived with damage, maybe just luck of the draw I suppose but this was a 10/10. Would highly recommend to anyone!

J’ai acheté cette valise dans le cadre d’un voyage de 3 semaines en Europe. La taille est en fait leMaximum autorisé sur les vols et entre aisément dans la soute à bagages de l’avion. J’ai apprécié aussi de pouvoir utiliser l’extension lors de mes déplacements qui me permettaient de loger un peu plus d’articles. Les divisons sont très ergonomiques et permettent d’avoir accès facilement à tout le contenu. Je recommande

reviews.reviewTitle: Don’t buy this model at all or You will regret it.
reviews.reviewText: Don’t but it, it looks horrible in reality and defective. It literally looks like as if it has been used by someone before because of all the scratches on it.
